Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back BREAKFAST DAILY ADD ON View gallery / Back Ta'aktana, A Luxury Collection Resort Resort View Flores Islands - Labuan Bajo Pink Beach Labuan Bajo Ta'aktana, A Luxury Collection Resort- Leros - Terrace Tables Ta'aktana, A Luxury Collection Resort- Lobby area Komodo Island TA’AKTANA, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa &vert; Return flights • Transfers • 3 Nights • Breakfast daily Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions TA’AKTANA, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa TA’AKTANA, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa in Labuan Bajo, Indonesia, blends five-star luxury with local heritage. Set on 16 hectares overlooking the Flores Sea, it features elegant villas and suites, a private beach, an Olympic-sized pool, and the serene Di’a Spa. Guests can savour gourmet dining inspired by local and international cuisine. TA’AKTANA offers a perfect balance of relaxation, adventure, and cultural immersion in unmatched comfort. Labuan Bajo (Known as Komodo Island) Labuan Bajo is worth visiting because it combines adventure and beauty in one place. From exploring the legendary Komodo dragons and diving in crystal-clear waters full of manta rays and coral reefs, to sailing across stunning islands and enjoying unforgettable sunsets over the Flores Sea. View more View less 3 nights + domestic flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 2525 per person share twin. International flights are additional BREAKFAST DAILY ADD ON Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 30 Nov 25 or until sold out Your stay at TA’AKTANA, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa Labuan Bajo Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Batik Air from Denpasar to Labuan Bajo Return airport to hotel transfers 3 nights accommodation in a Wae Rana Suite Breakfast daily Private Full-Day Island-Hopping Tour: Includes Lunch for Two and Non-Alcoholic Beverages One time minibar for Wae Rana Suite Pressing service up to 2 pieces per person per day Three types of local indigenous amenities upon arrival 1x Tea Omakase for 2 Adults at Nera Lounge WiFi Room Types Wae Rana Suite The Wae Rana Suite combines luxurious comfort with serene surroundings, offering an unforgettable retreat at Ta’aktanna Luxury Resort 3 night package from $2525 per person share twin. International flights are additional Travel 01 Nov - 22 Dec 25, 04 Jan - 12 Feb 26, 24 Feb - 17 Mar 26, 25 Mar - 30 Jun 26 3 night package from $2945 per person share twin. International flights are additional Travel 13 Feb - 23 Feb 26, 18 Mar - 24 Mar 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 30 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 23 Sep 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. Advertised packages are based on return Domestic flight between Bali and Labuan Bajo is based on Batik Air in Economy Class • International flights are additional • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense. Day of the week surcharges may apply. • Min/max stays apply • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Bedding configurations may vary on twin share options • Twin share is two adults sharing a room using existing bedding • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Airfares are non-refundable and non transferable • Airfares and Accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
